name: SquidKour
description:
SquidKour is a classic platformer with 9 levels some are easy and some are a bit of a  challenge at the end there is a Boss Battle.Can YOU beat this game?

This is my first published game so keep in mind it isnt the best made.

Boss battle isn't so good but i tried my best.

Game is made in Gdevelop.Credits are in game.
